Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Requires a fiscal note when a bill enacts or amends a law impacting the cost of utility services
Summary: Requires a fiscal note when a bill enacts or amends a law impacting the cost of utility services.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to establishing a fiscal note on bills affecting ratepayers' costs for utility services
